languages.text: "Ах, судно! Наконец мы покинем это ужасное место, наводненное алыми оттенками агонии и мертвенно-бледным отчаянием".
"Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."
languages.original_text: "Ах, судно! Наконец мы покинем это ужасное место, наводненное алыми оттенками агонии и мертвенно-бледным отчаянием".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place, flooded with scarlet hues of agony and the washed-out tinges of despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place, flooded with scarlet hues of agony and the washed-out tinges of despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, un vaisseau ! Nous allons enfin pouvoir quitter cet horrible endroit noyé dans les auras écarlates de l'agonie et les relents délavés du désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, un vaisseau ! Nous allons enfin pouvoir quitter cet horrible endroit noyé dans les auras écarlates de l'agonie et les relents délavés du désespoir. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “啊，是飞船！我们终于可以离开这个可怕的地方了，这里充满了痛苦的红色与绝望的黯色。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: “啊，是飞船！我们终于可以离开这个可怕的地方了，这里充满了痛苦的红色与绝望的黯色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、船です！苦悩の緋色と絶望で洗われたような色合いであふれかえるこの恐ろしい場所から、あたくしたちはついに旅立つのですね」
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、船です！苦悩の緋色と絶望で洗われたような色合いであふれかえるこの恐ろしい場所から、あたくしたちはついに旅立つのですね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, ein Schiff! Endlich verlassen wir diesen von purpurnen Schattierungen der Pein und verwaschenen Färbungen der Verzweiflung durchfluteten Ort."
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, ein Schiff! Endlich verlassen wir diesen von purpurnen Schattierungen der Pein und verwaschenen Färbungen der Verzweiflung durchfluteten Ort."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ah, una nave! Por fin nos marcharemos de este lugar espantoso, lleno de las tonalidades escarlata de la agonía y los matices apagados de la desesperación».
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, una nave! Por fin nos marcharemos de este lugar espantoso, lleno de las tonalidades escarlata de la agonía y los matices apagados de la desesperación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Demek bir gemi var! Izdırabın kızıl tonları ve biçareliğin solgunluğuna boğulmuş bu korkunç yerden nihayet kurtulabileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Ah, a ship! We will finally leave this horrible place flooded with scarlet hues of agony and washed-out tinges of despair."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, demek bir gemi var! Izdırabın kızıl tonları ve biçareliğin solgunluğuna boğulmuş bu korkunç yerden nihayet kurtulabileceğiz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
